resources.string: You can play videos in background, just open any video.
Automatic headset play/pause can be adjusted from settings.
In some playback ui, you can rotate screen.
Long press play/pause button to stop/reset.
Long press skip/next/previous button to skip to random item in playlist.
Long press jump/open button to open playback ui.
Long press to open lyrics menu on lyrics view.
Long press cover art to open menu.
Long press visualization button to change styles.
If songs are not shown, Left drawer -> Refresh Or Left drawer -> Settings -> Library -> Add scan location -> (previous step)
Beta version will have some of the premium features unlocked.
Visit our YouTube Channel/Playlist (Left drawer -> Help...) for demos and videos.
Visit our website (Settings -> About ...) for latest updates and more information.
Almost every button, ui, â€¦ has long-press action. Be sure to find out.
Headset media button is sometimes supported. 1 press - play/pause 2 fast press - next 3 fast press - previous
Long-press playback ui parts to open menu.
Help us! By creating tour/informative videos. Send us YouTube links, you\'ll get surprises!
Be sure to check out Analytics (swipe left!), Playback UI styles (long-press menu -> change ui), Library UI styles, Audio visualization styles, these are free for limited time!
You can now share the whole music file with your friends using any supported app.
You can now share lyrics with your friends using any supported app.
We now support audio fingerprinting, i.e. you can get details of audio even if it has no tags.
You can download cover art again. Long-press cover art on playback ui.
This is a smart player, it\'ll learn and improve itself over time, as you use it.
